Using VBMS-R Decision Tools in Hearing Impairment Claims
The Veterans Benefits Management System – Rating (VBMS-R) includes embedded calculators for hearing loss and tinnitus and ear diseases to help decision makers assign correct evaluations and generate required narrative explanation.  The calculator output is placed in the rating
Narrative
.
For the purpose of assigning a disability percentage for hearing loss
always enter air conduction results
into the hearing loss calculator.
References
:  For more information on
VBMS-R, see the
VBMS-R User Guide
(also available within the application and accessible by selecting “Help”), and
the prohibition against using bone conduction results, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 2.B.2.l
.
